title: Remote Corporate Paralegal
job_overview:
We are a fast-growing real estate investment and development company based in Silicon Valley, managing over $300M in assets. We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Remote Corporate Paralegal to support our U.S. legal and operations team.

Responsibilities:
- Assist the U.S. team with corporate operation matters as needed
- Support the operations team in developing Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)
- Draft applications for government filings and compliance documentation, such as business insurance reviewing and overseeing,
- Handle other operation and administrative tasks assigned by the U.S. team

Work Hours:
This is a full-time remote role position.
Monday to Friday
9:00AM to 5:30PM Pacific Time Zone
